channel.title: Form Handling on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Form Handling on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Form Validation With Vuelidate Vuejs
item.description: Learn how to validate forms using Vuelidate in this tutorial by Paul Halliday, the author of Vue.js 2 Design Patterns and Best Practices. In this post, you’ll use a third-party library named Vuelidate to perform model validation depending on a particular rule set Create a New Vue Project Create a playground project by running the following in your Terminal: # Create a new Vue project $ vue init webpack-simple vue-validation # Navigate to directory $ cd vue-validation # Install dependencies $ npm install # Install Vuelidate $ npm install vuelidate # Run application $ npm run dev What is Vuelidate?
